s: I was hesitant to order the Ripafratta Hazelnut Coffee Single Serve K-Cup, a brand of coffee I hadn't heard of. I am very satisfied with the flavor & I got a good price for this offer of 80 k-cups. I most likely will order again if it is still offered on Amazon & the price is good.
